languages.text: Пламя неохотно вгрызлось в жгуты терна. Порождение варпа молило о пощаде, в нежном голосе слышалось неподдельное страдание. Сердца многих огнеметчиков не выдержали, и они бросились в заросли спасать незримую жертву, встречая на шипах мучительную смерть. Когда огонь наконец очистил отсек, от отряда осталось меньше половины воинов.

traits.locale_text: Пламя неохотно вгрызлось в жгуты терна. Порождение варпа молило о пощаде, в нежном голосе слышалось неподдельное страдание. Сердца многих огнеметчиков не выдержали, и они бросились в заросли спасать незримую жертву, встречая на шипах мучительную смерть. Когда огонь наконец очистил отсек, от отряда осталось меньше половины воинов.

languages.text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.
languages.original_text: Пламя неохотно вгрызлось в жгуты терна. Порождение варпа молило о пощаде, в нежном голосе слышалось неподдельное страдание. Сердца многих огнеметчиков не выдержали, и они бросились в заросли спасать незримую жертву, встречая на шипах мучительную смерть. Когда огонь наконец очистил отсек, от отряда осталось меньше половины воинов.

traits.locale_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature kept begging for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — and the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, causing them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the flames.

By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the flames.

By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

languages.text: 火焰不情愿地吞噬着肥厚的藤蔓。这只亚空间生物不停地乞求怜悯，温柔的声音中充满了痛苦。这使得许多手持火焰喷射器的士兵心生动摇，冲进藤蔓之中，拯救那位根本看不见的受害者，最终被燃烧的荆棘刺穿。当房间净化完毕时，超过一半的士兵在大火中丧生。
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

traits.locale_text: 火焰不情愿地吞噬着肥厚的藤蔓。这只亚空间生物不停地乞求怜悯，温柔的声音中充满了痛苦。这使得许多手持火焰喷射器的士兵心生动摇，冲进藤蔓之中，拯救那位根本看不见的受害者，最终被燃烧的荆棘刺穿。当房间净化完毕时，超过一半的士兵在大火中丧生。

languages.text: El fuego acababa a duras penas con las carnosas lianas. La criatura de la disformidad suplicó clemencia sin cesar, con su suave voz llena de sufrimiento; los corazones de muchos portadores de lanzallamas flaquearon, incitándoles a empalarse en las espinas ardientes mientras se abalanzaban sobre la maraña para salvar a la víctima invisible. Para cuando se limpió la cámara, más de la mitad del escuadrón de lanzallamas había perecido en las llamas.
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

traits.locale_text: El fuego acababa a duras penas con las carnosas lianas. La criatura de la disformidad suplicó clemencia sin cesar, con su suave voz llena de sufrimiento; los corazones de muchos portadores de lanzallamas flaquearon, incitándoles a empalarse en las espinas ardientes mientras se abalanzaban sobre la maraña para salvar a la víctima invisible. Para cuando se limpió la cámara, más de la mitad del escuadrón de lanzallamas había perecido en las llamas.

languages.text: 肉肉しいツルを火がじわじわと蝕む。<歪み>の生き物は延々と慈悲を求め、弱々しいその声は苦しみに満ちていた…火炎放射隊の多くは心がギクリとして、思わず見えない被害者を救おうとゴチャゴチャしたそこに駆け込み、燃えるトゲに自ら突き刺さりに行く。部屋が浄化される頃には、火炎放射部隊の半分以上が炎の中で命を落とした。
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

traits.locale_text: 肉肉しいツルを火がじわじわと蝕む。<歪み>の生き物は延々と慈悲を求め、弱々しいその声は苦しみに満ちていた…火炎放射隊の多くは心がギクリとして、思わず見えない被害者を救おうとゴチャゴチャしたそこに駆け込み、燃えるトゲに自ら突き刺さりに行く。部屋が浄化される頃には、火炎放射部隊の半分以上が炎の中で命を落とした。

languages.text: Les flammes lèchent péniblement les épaisses lianes et la créature du Warp se met à implorer sans relâche qu'on l'épargne d'une voix douce empreinte de souffrance. Les supplications sont si convaincantes que les hommes ne peuvent s'empêcher de se précipiter vers les épines enflammées pour tenter de sauver la victime invisible, au point de s'y empaler. Plus de la moitié d'entre eux périssent dans le brasier avant que la salle ne soit purifiée.
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

traits.locale_text: Les flammes lèchent péniblement les épaisses lianes et la créature du Warp se met à implorer sans relâche qu'on l'épargne d'une voix douce empreinte de souffrance. Les supplications sont si convaincantes que les hommes ne peuvent s'empêcher de se précipiter vers les épines enflammées pour tenter de sauver la victime invisible, au point de s'y empaler. Plus de la moitié d'entre eux périssent dans le brasier avant que la salle ne soit purifiée.

languages.text: Das Feuer nagt nur zögerlich an den dicken, fleischigen Ranken. Die Warpkreatur fleht endlos um Gnade, ihre sanfte Stimme voller Leid. Die Herzen vieler Flammenträger werden dadurch erweicht und sie pfählen sich selbst auf den brennenden Dornen, als sie losstürzen, um das unsichtbare Opfer zu retten. Als die Kammer endlich gesäubert ist, ist über die Hälfte des Flammenwerfertrupps in dem Feuer verendet.
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.

traits.locale_text: Das Feuer nagt nur zögerlich an den dicken, fleischigen Ranken. Die Warpkreatur fleht endlos um Gnade, ihre sanfte Stimme voller Leid. Die Herzen vieler Flammenträger werden dadurch erweicht und sie pfählen sich selbst auf den brennenden Dornen, als sie losstürzen, um das unsichtbare Opfer zu retten. Als die Kammer endlich gesäubert ist, ist über die Hälfte des Flammenwerfertrupps in dem Feuer verendet.

languages.text: Alevler, dolgun sarmaşıkları isteksizce yakmaya çalıştı. Öteboyut yaratığı, durmadan merhamet dilendi. Acıyla dolu sesi, alevsaçan taşıyanların kalplerinde tereddüt uyandırdı. Pek çoğu, görülmeyen kurbanı kurtarmak için sarmaşık yumağına doğru atılıp kendilerini dikenlere sapladı. Oda temizlendikten sonra alevsaçan mangasının yarısından çoğunun yangında can verdiği görüldü.
languages.original_text: The fire reluctantly gnawed on the meaty vines. The warp creature begged endlessly for mercy, its soft voice full of suffering — the hearts of many flame bearers faltered, inciting them to impale themselves on the burning thorns as they rushed into the tangle to save the unseen victim. By the time the chamber was cleansed, more than half of the flamethrower squad perished in the blaze.
